title: Martin the cobbler
creator_credit: Billy Budd Films and Will Vinton
brief_description: A clay animated film for children about a Russian shoemaker who discovers new meanings in life by meditating on old truths. Based on a Leo Tolstoy folktale “Where Love Is, God Is”. The introduction and narration is by Alexandra Tolstoy, daughter of Leo Tolstoy.
